title: MUSIC GEN_MUS 175-0-20 Selected Topics in Music Literature for Non-Majors

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This class will explore music and performance in the film musical, investigating key themes and tropes of the genre from the early years of sound film to the early 21st century. Blending historical, theoretical, and cultural approaches, we will address the musical's iterations in diverse contexts including the "golden age" of MGM musicals, Bollywood, documentary, and television. Course requirements will include watching a weekly film, engaging with academic reading, and midterm and final projects.

subject: GEN_MUS
